episodes.title: The New Dawn
episodes.plot: As the season begins in Bahrain, Ferrari hopes new cars will finally propel them to the top, and Haas makes a risky bet on a last-minute driver switch.

episodes.title: Bounce Back
episodes.plot: Mercedes principal Toto Wolff works to combat the team's unexpected struggles, while Lewis Hamilton navigates a bumpy ride in the team's redesigned car.

episodes.title: Matter of Principal
episodes.plot: Ferrari drivers and decision-makers feel the pressure of high expectations at a star-studded new event in Miami and a game-changing race at Silverstone.

episodes.title: Like Father, Like Son?
episodes.plot: Crashes and costs mount for Haas as driver Mick Schumacher fights to live up to his father's racing legacy and prove his worth to the team.

episodes.title: Pardon My French
episodes.plot: Otmar Szafnauer's efforts to overhaul Alpine bear fruit - until a new round of driver musical chairs throws his plans for the future into question.

episodes.title: Nice Guys Finish Last
episodes.plot: Daniel Ricciardo's future starts to look uncertain when McLaren team managers set their sights on new talent, while Alpine weighs the best way forward.

episodes.title: Hot Seat
episodes.plot: As the Red Bull team pushes to build on their lead against Ferrari, all eyes are on Sergio "Checo" Pérez during a dramatic Monaco Grand Prix.

episodes.title: Alpha Male
episodes.plot: When Pierre Gasly announces he's leaving Alpha Tauri, Yuki Tsunoda faces losing a teammate and a friend. Can he step up to show that he's ready to lead?

episodes.title: Over the Limit
episodes.plot: With both championships within reach, Red Bull's team faces incendiary accusations that they've cheated by violating a league-wide spending cap.

episodes.title: End of the Road
episodes.plot: The 2022 season hurtles toward a conclusion in Abu Dhabi, where Ferrari fights to hold off Mercedes and McLaren hopes for a miracle to overtake Alpine.
